name: Big Five Inventory-2
description: A 60-item measure of the Big Five personality traits: Extraversion, Agreeableness, Conscientiousness, Negative Emotionality (Neuroticism), and Open-Mindedness. An updated version of the original BFI with improved psychometric properties.
reference: Soto, C. J., & John, O. P. (2017). The next Big Five Inventory (BFI-2): Developing and assessing a hierarchical model with 15 facets to enhance bandwidth, fidelity, and predictive power. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 113(1), 117-143.
instructions: Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with each statement.

questions.name: bfi2_1
questions.description: I am someone who is outgoing, sociable.

questions.name: bfi2_2
questions.description: I am someone who is compassionate, has a soft heart.

questions.name: bfi2_3
questions.description: I am someone who tends to be disorganized.

questions.name: bfi2_4
questions.description: I am someone who worries a lot.

questions.name: bfi2_5
questions.description: I am someone who is fascinated by art, music, or literature.

questions.name: bfi2_6
questions.description: I am someone who is dominant, acts as a leader.

questions.name: bfi2_7
questions.description: I am someone who is sometimes rude to others.

questions.name: bfi2_8
questions.description: I am someone who has difficulty getting started on tasks.

questions.name: bfi2_9
questions.description: I am someone who tends to feel depressed, blue.

questions.name: bfi2_10
questions.description: I am someone who has little interest in abstract ideas.

questions.name: bfi2_11
questions.description: I am someone who is full of energy.

questions.name: bfi2_12
questions.description: I am someone who assumes the best about people.

questions.name: bfi2_13
questions.description: I am someone who is reliable, can always be counted on.

questions.name: bfi2_14
questions.description: I am someone who is emotionally stable, not easily upset.

questions.name: bfi2_15
questions.description: I am someone who is original, comes up with new ideas.

questions.name: bfi2_16
questions.description: I am someone who is sometimes shy, introverted.

questions.name: bfi2_17
questions.description: I am someone who is helpful and unselfish with others.

questions.name: bfi2_18
questions.description: I am someone who keeps things neat and tidy.

questions.name: bfi2_19
questions.description: I am someone who is relaxed, handles stress well.

questions.name: bfi2_20
questions.description: I am someone who has few artistic interests.

questions.name: bfi2_21
questions.description: I am someone who prefers to have others take charge.

questions.name: bfi2_22
questions.description: I am someone who is respectful, treats others with respect.

questions.name: bfi2_23
questions.description: I am someone who is persistent, works until the task is finished.

questions.name: bfi2_24
questions.description: I am someone who feels secure, comfortable with self.

questions.name: bfi2_25
questions.description: I am someone who is complex, a deep thinker.

questions.name: bfi2_26
questions.description: I am someone who is less active than other people.

questions.name: bfi2_27
questions.description: I am someone who tends to find fault with others.

questions.name: bfi2_28
questions.description: I am someone who can be somewhat careless.

questions.name: bfi2_29
questions.description: I am someone who is temperamental, gets emotional easily.

questions.name: bfi2_30
questions.description: I am someone who has little creativity.

questions.name: bfi2_31
questions.description: I am someone who is talkative.

questions.name: bfi2_32
questions.description: I am someone who can be cold and uncaring.

questions.name: bfi2_33
questions.description: I am someone who leaves a mess, doesn't clean up.

questions.name: bfi2_34
questions.description: I am someone who rarely feels anxious or afraid.

questions.name: bfi2_35
questions.description: I am someone who values art and beauty.

questions.name: bfi2_36
questions.description: I am someone who finds it hard to influence people.

questions.name: bfi2_37
questions.description: I am someone who is polite, courteous to others.

questions.name: bfi2_38
questions.description: I am someone who is easily distracted.

questions.name: bfi2_39
questions.description: I am someone who often feels sad.

questions.name: bfi2_40
questions.description: I am someone who is not interested in abstract ideas.

questions.name: bfi2_41
questions.description: I am someone who shows a lot of enthusiasm.

questions.name: bfi2_42
questions.description: I am someone who tends to be suspicious of others' intentions.

questions.name: bfi2_43
questions.description: I am someone who is efficient, gets things done.

questions.name: bfi2_44
questions.description: I am someone who keeps their emotions under control.

questions.name: bfi2_45
questions.description: I am someone who is curious about many different things.

questions.name: bfi2_46
questions.description: I am someone who rarely talks a lot.

questions.name: bfi2_47
questions.description: I am someone who feels little sympathy for others.

questions.name: bfi2_48
questions.description: I am someone who makes plans and sticks to them.

questions.name: bfi2_49
questions.description: I am someone who gets upset easily.

questions.name: bfi2_50
questions.description: I am someone who avoids intellectual, philosophical discussions.

questions.name: bfi2_51
questions.description: I am someone who is assertive, speaks up.

questions.name: bfi2_52
questions.description: I am someone who likes to cooperate with others.

questions.name: bfi2_53
questions.description: I am someone who tends to be lazy.

questions.name: bfi2_54
questions.description: I am someone who stays optimistic after experiencing a setback.

questions.name: bfi2_55
questions.description: I am someone who enjoys thinking about complex problems.

questions.name: bfi2_56
questions.description: I am someone who tends to be quiet.

questions.name: bfi2_57
questions.description: I am someone who is forgiving of others' mistakes.

questions.name: bfi2_58
questions.description: I am someone who is responsible, dependable.

questions.name: bfi2_59
questions.description: I am someone who is moody, has up and down mood swings.

questions.name: bfi2_60
questions.description: I am someone who is inventive, finds clever ways to do things.
